about_the_game:
Step into the world of timeless art with a playful twist! Cats of Mona Lisa is a relaxing hidden-object game where you explore beautifully reimagined classical paintings in search of ten mischievous cats cleverly hidden within each masterpiece.

Every painting comes alive with vibrant details, as you zoom in and scan each brushstroke for a flick of a tail or the glint of curious eyes. These feline stowaways have blended seamlessly into the art, testing your observation skills and rewarding your persistence with satisfying discoveries.

Features:

  • Classic Paintings, Reimagined: Discover iconic artworks transformed with a whimsical twist as you hunt for hidden cats.

  • Ten Cats in Every Painting: Each level challenges you to find all ten felines, each hiding in clever and unexpected places.

  • Relaxing Gameplay: Enjoy a no-pressure, calming experience that lets you unwind and immerse yourself in art.

  • Interactive Tools: Use zoom and hint features to examine every detail of the paintings.

  • A Game for All Ages: Simple mechanics make it fun for everyone, whether you're a casual gamer or a hidden-object enthusiast.
